attributes.action: minimum hours for learner drivers by qualified instructors
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: poeple learning to drive should atleast have a minimum of 25 hours of driving tuition by an "approved driving instructor" before they are allowed to take a driving test,as that would increase road safety and would safe lives

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
